title: ImThour
author: ImThour
content: All these targets are calculated using Fibonacci Retracement. Consider this a speculation, Thanks.1. Bitcoin -  $173,8052. Ethereum - $11,4603. BNB - $1,1904. XRP - $8.975. ADA - $12.376. DOGE - $0.967. Solana - $1,3678. TRX - $0.159. MATIC - $710. LTC - $361

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: I don't know how you came up with the calculation using fibo but do you think XRP will get that high because that will mean almost 300% rise from the ATH around $3 which has been the highest in the life of XRP. The last time it got that high was without any court case.For doge coin, it may go pass your speculation if it got the hype of Elon musk but I don't know if Elon musk will keep an eye on it because it was really hyped the last time. Bitcoin is still the favourite.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.created_time: August 27, 2023, 08:19:29 AMLast edit: September 21, 2023, 08:29:44 AM by EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Quote from: ImThour on August 27, 2023, 05:52:35 AMAll these targets are calculated using Fibonacci Retracement. Consider this a speculation, Thanks.This is impossible!!!After all, we are all speculating and I was even happy to see some speculations here but only to read that you used Fibonacci retracement to get your predictions. How possible is that? This is certainly not possible, maybe you wanted to write another strategy. As the name implies, Fibonacci "retracement" is a retracement tool that helps traders to know retracement, trend continuation or reversal. But all these must be within a price limit that has happened before, it can never predict outside of its range that long.How come you get the values that those coins have never hit before by using Fibonacci retracement?The tool is not even good for such predictions because it only tells where support and resistance could possibly happen, not to say the fact that it must be within the prices that have initially been witnessed by the coins. Not even the Fibonacci sequence/extension/expansion is capable of this.This can never be possible!

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: As a trader, I only learn about MA, EMA, BB and RSI which have been helpful for me. I read a little about Fibonacci Retracement just now and I see that EarnOnVictorto is correct. I do not know how you truly get your speculation, but it is interesting for me because I am also predicting that bitcoin will get to $170000 and doge to increase to or slightly increase above $1.I will advice people to go for bitcoin the most. The coming halving and the bitcoin spot ETF will help the crypto market which can make these possible.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Coins on that list that I wouldn't suggest anyone to use long-term TA on simply because the coins are total crap: XRP, ADA, LTC.The other coins I didn't mention aren't necessarily good per se, but at least they have narratives that could push them back up in the next bull run.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on August 27, 2023, 10:01:55 AMCoins on that list that I wouldn't suggest anyone to use long-term TA on simply because the coins are total crap: XRP, ADA, LTC.The other coins I didn't mention aren't necessarily good per se, but at least they have narratives that could push them back up in the next bull run.You did not mention bitcoin, is it not necessarily good? As for me, it is good for people to go for bitcoin while other coins (altcoins) should be alternatives. Why mention litecoin? Because it is copying bitcoin? Litecoin has huge community and I think it will pump above $500 in the next bull market. ADA too is a good project. I may not like ripple because SEC are still against it. But why ada and litecoin?

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: ImThour on August 27, 2023, 05:52:35 AMAll these targets are calculated using Fibonacci Retracement. Consider this a speculation, Thanks.1. Bitcoin -  $173,8052. Ethereum - $11,4603. BNB - $1,1904. XRP - $8.975. ADA - $12.376. DOGE - $0.967. Solana - $1,3678. TRX - $0.159. MATIC - $710. LTC - $361I have quoted your speculation to see how the results of your prediction will be during the next bull run. I also believe that Bitcoin will of course be a on top during the bull run because it will definitely trade over $100k and there is a possibility that Bitcoin may reach or cross $150k in the next bull run, but it will surely cross the $120k price mark in the next bull run. I don't know about the way other coins will react to the next bull run but definitely your prediction related to most of the coins seems genuine to me.Quote from: mk4 on August 27, 2023, 10:01:55 AMCoins on that list that I wouldn't suggest anyone to use long-term TA on simply because the coins are total crap: XRP, ADA, LTC.The other coins I didn't mention aren't necessarily good per se, but at least they have narratives that could push them back up in the next bull run.I won't say anything about ADA or XRP, but LTC is a hidden gem and it may get to very higher values in future. XRP is not going to cross $2 mark any soon and even in next bull run its chances are very low as compare to other coins in the list and same is the case for the ADA because that one is totally a crap and I don't think it will ever gain much value even in the next bull run. But, LTC will surely gain good value in next bull run and I even think that it could surpass $361 if it gets the attention of the investors.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on August 27, 2023, 10:38:12 AMWhy mention litecoin? Because it is copying bitcoin? Litecoin has huge community and I think it will pump above $500 in the next bull market. ADA too is a good project. I may not like ripple because SEC are still against it. But why ada and litecoin?Litecoin is pretty much a Bitcoin testnet. Yes, fees are cheaper, but if we're going to make decisions of fees then there are dozens of other cryptocurrencies to use. Not saying I'd 100% count out LTC, but the narrative is weak and that there are far better bets out there.As for ADA, Cardano "the chain" has been up and running since forever and yet even chains that are only built last year have lots more protocols/platforms running on them compared to Cardano. They're either just super slow and will blossom very late(which is totally fine if you're super patient), or it's pretty much finished. One thing's for sure, I ain't betting on it.

comments.author: Minecache
comments.body: Quote from: palle11 on August 27, 2023, 06:30:01 AMI don't know how you came up with the calculation using fibo but do you think XRP will get that high because that will mean almost 300% rise from the ATH around $3 which has been the highest in the life of XRP. The last time it got that high was without any court case.For doge coin, it may go pass your speculation if it got the hype of Elon musk but I don't know if Elon musk will keep an eye on it because it was really hyped the last time. Bitcoin is still the favourite.The numbers the OP provided seem crazy but I'll believe it and maybe even achieve a higher gain than the OP predicted. Have you ever thought about a super cycle? If you combine the factors of the world economy and the market cycle, you can see that the bullish season will most likely coincide with the time when the world economy enters a recovery and growth cycle. That will drive investment demand to the highest levels we've ever seen, so the market will be hyped up like crazy. I even believe bitcoin will hit over $200k and not just $173k as OP predicted.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: It would be ludicrous for coins like Dogecoin to reach this price in two years and the door might open for more to take risks by investing in altcoins.Personally, I hope that most of them fail because they are duplicates and because they reduce the possibility of an increase in the price of Bitcoin, but most of altcoin are very volatile and are not subject to technical analysis due to the small capacity of the market and its dependence on some variables.I may agree with Bitcoin, Ethereum, and TRX.MATIC - $7 is a lot for cheap layer2 blockchain.It is difficult to see others within close range of above mentioned.

comments.author: armanda90
comments.body: Quote from: ImThour on August 27, 2023, 05:52:35 AMAll these targets are calculated using Fibonacci Retracement. Consider this a speculation, Thanks.3. BNB - $1,19010. LTC - $361I am hoping with bitcoin above will raise based on your expectation actually with BNB have dropped drastically current last three months investing price fell down from $340 drop to $216. Have many time launchpad opening in Binance exchange can't help for BNB coins back to higher price above $300. Last hoping with Litecoin and seems realistic with your expectation price, ever raised all time high price above $300 and current BNB price dropped drastically under $65. Need x50 for Litecoin up to reach with your expectation but need more patience when LTC possibility back to higher price. Last month with halving can't give positive impact for Litecoin back up to higher price and current highest price in this months above 114$ before going drop again.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Some of it is unrealistic but this is part of speculation, which for me is just a guess and should not be fully believed.Quote from: palle11 on August 27, 2023, 06:30:01 AMI don't know how you came up with the calculation using fibo but do you think XRP will get that high because that will mean almost 300% rise from the ATH around $3 which has been the highest in the life of XRP. The last time it got that high was without any court case.If it wins the case with the court against the SEC it might happen, how the previous news that XRP is not a securities coin is pumped quite high, so I think maybe it will be more than our expectations.Quote from: palle11 on August 27, 2023, 06:30:01 AMFor doge coin, it may go pass your speculation if it got the hype of Elon musk but I don't know if Elon musk will keep an eye on it because it was really hyped the last time. Bitcoin is still the favourite.Yeah Doge could be more than $1 as a meme coin in the future, Elon Musk still seems to be hype on this meme several times always associated with X.com maybe his hype will come again.Bitcoin I believe is over $200K.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on August 27, 2023, 02:07:42 PMIt would be ludicrous for coins like Dogecoin to reach this price in two years and the door might open for more to take risks by investing in altcoins.Same thoughts. But it's really not impossible if we get a full-blown bull market like what we had in the past, and at the same time if Elon Musk gives DOGE an extra push upwards through whatever bizarre way he can think of to pump DOGE. Of course, expect a Burj Khalifa-looking chart.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: These predictions are really crazy, I'm only getting confident about Bitcoin's target and don't expect much from the rest because all the rest will always be considered alternatives. But yes, if there is any other coin with confidence after Bitcoin, it is Ethereum and I also think that Ethereum has the ability to achieve this target. Let's see if these targets are achieved during the next bull market.Quote from: salad daging on August 27, 2023, 02:22:29 PMYeah Doge could be more than $1 as a meme coin in the future, Elon Musk still seems to be hype on this meme several times always associated with X.com maybe his hype will come again.Maybe Elon musk will get back into business, and somehow connect Dogecoin with x.com to create hype and give Dogecoin a big pump. But these are just our guesses, anything can happen in the crypto market beyond our expectations. Now, even if we give a suggestion to someone, we have to think a few times whether our expected results will actually come from the market or not.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Quote from: ScamViruS on August 27, 2023, 02:49:54 PMQuote from: salad daging on August 27, 2023, 02:22:29 PMYeah Doge could be more than $1 as a meme coin in the future, Elon Musk still seems to be hype on this meme several times always associated with X.com maybe his hype will come again.Maybe Elon musk will get back into business, and somehow connect Dogecoin with x.com to create hype and give Dogecoin a big pump. But these are just our guesses, anything can happen in the crypto market beyond our expectations. Now, even if we give a suggestion to someone, we have to think a few times whether our expected results will actually come from the market or not.Never know what's on Elon Musk's mind he always starts with his madness before the dogecoin logo is made an icon on x.com as a result there is a pump on this meme it is clear that his influence is strong so there is a big push on this meme, there are even people waiting for Elon Musk's madness again on x.com whether from tweeting memes again or other actions that are ridiculous but many communities believe.The result no one knows when the time is, time will show whether it will come or not.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: These speculations can be achieved in how many time? I guess these numbers are a bit high. We might see these coin’s increase in price, but not so high. Everyone already saying that Bitcoins will cross ATH price in 2024, but it won’t go up after 100k usd according to me. Also XRP’s prediction is too wild according to me. I mean the coin got potential, but expecting more than 200% rise is still useless according to me. Let’s hope for the best.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: But I thought BNB was under huge pressure just like FTT was in FTX bankruptcy, but of course I do not have any solid proof; instead, I read some articles on it, and I think other than BNB, I am quite amazed to see the prices of all the assets. In my prediction, I was thinking the most BTC could touch is 110,000 dollars, but you are saying it has the potential to touch more than $170,000. Now, this is something really amazing if it happens, but honestly, I think to touch that target, BTC needs a lot of trading volume and buying potential. To touch that digit, the potential of buying must be twice or three times than the previous times when it was on the day when BTC touched $69k.I am not a trader of any alts but still think ETH is a good investment at the time as it is also approving many ETFs, and now PayPal is promoting things in ETH just like their own dollars based on the ETH blockchain. And many other platforms and political parties like ETH for centralization purposes, but still, one could make profit in BTC and make profit in ETH, so why risk the factor of decentralization over centralization by investing in ETH? But still, I liked the information you shared, and thanks for it.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: salad daging on August 27, 2023, 04:23:33 PMQuote from: ScamViruS on August 27, 2023, 02:49:54 PMQuote from: salad daging on August 27, 2023, 02:22:29 PMYeah Doge could be more than $1 as a meme coin in the future, Elon Musk still seems to be hype on this meme several times always associated with X.com maybe his hype will come again.Maybe Elon musk will get back into business, and somehow connect Dogecoin with x.com to create hype and give Dogecoin a big pump. But these are just our guesses, anything can happen in the crypto market beyond our expectations. Now, even if we give a suggestion to someone, we have to think a few times whether our expected results will actually come from the market or not.Never know what's on Elon Musk's mind he always starts with his madness before the dogecoin logo is made an icon on x.com as a result there is a pump on this meme it is clear that his influence is strong so there is a big push on this meme, there are even people waiting for Elon Musk's madness again on x.com whether from tweeting memes again or other actions that are ridiculous but many communities believe.The result no one knows when the time is, time will show whether it will come or not.Investing in Dogecoin is also very risky depending on Elon musk, it's hard to predict what he does when. The crypto community has seen Elon musk's madness as he pumped up Dogecoin by creating hype. But it is also questionable whether he will do the same thing again and again. It can be assumed that he will do more madness within X.com, but what he is actually going to do is beyond the imagination of normal investors like us. Elon musk used his influence power to influence the market many times, now we may soon see if he has any other plans for his favorite coin Dogecoin.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Quote from: ImThour on August 27, 2023, 05:52:35 AMAll these targets are calculated using Fibonacci Retracement. Consider this a speculation, Thanks.1. Bitcoin -  $173,8052. Ethereum - $11,4603. BNB - $1,1904. XRP - $8.975. ADA - $12.376. DOGE - $0.967. Solana - $1,3678. TRX - $0.159. MATIC - $710. LTC - $361Quite Surprising, A few questions and a few my own thoughts, so coming up with the first is I am really surprised with the total valuation of the BTC and ETH to the ATH.. I know its a speculation well for these two I think we can give a loose hand but SOL how ? When ? I really don't think that SOL had enough potential to raise up to 1k..Moving on to ADA I was expecting that for Matic that can be sure and even more, LTC fascinating LTC vs SOL I think LTC has enough potential to cross over $700. I think there should be 3 more DOT, ATOM, and LINK Speculations..So as OP gave us his top 10 I would like to customize the list by replacing these 3 with the DOGE, TRX and nothing else haha my list will have 11 coins. the remaining speculations will be as follows.DOT - $85+ATOM - $63+LINK - $54+I would like to have comments of seniors and fellows on the AVAX,ICP and NEAR as well.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: ImThour on August 27, 2023, 05:52:35 AM Consider this a speculation, Thanks.Well, if this is all about speculation, then I suggest it's better suited for the speculation board. Among all the coins you mentioned, with Bitcoin being the first in my portfolio, I can only add four more coins from your list, which are ETH, BNB, MATIC, and Doge coins, not because I agree with your prediction but because I think that those four coins are going to be a bit profitable (it might as well not be profitable). In the last bull run, Dogecoin traded at about $0.9 on the Binance exchange (witness), and if things work out so well with Elon and Dogecoin during the next bull run, then it's going to go above $1; otherwise, we can just see it around $0.5. Ethereum would not also get to $11k+, nor would BNB be able to get to $1k and above.
